trends: There have been no other sightings in King City
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at friends Ranch House located next to Fort Hunter-Ligget just south ofKing City. Actual loaction was Barr Canyon entry spot on TOPO GPS map.There wasa lot of Military helicopter activity for two days and when they stopped flyingthis event occurred. I have seen this before and 2 others with me. The objectcaught my eye just over head and I watched for about 30 sec.s and it fade to apoint of light in 1 split secong and was gone. If it took to movement in thismanor I was looking NNW in the direction of the coastline of CA.. It would seemto me that some activity is occuring in this loacl. If need I would be morethan happy to escort anyone on to privat land that I have access for. I do muchhunting for big game in this area and I know the region very well. If anyone hasany infor about this I would like to know...THANKS
Summary: Large orange glow hovering then fades to a bright
